body:
Comment 2 by **awalterschulze**: 
I am running an open source project and would like to be able to say which versions of
go and protoc I support.
I am trying to get this setup to work with multiple dockers doing cross version builds
and running the tests.

As you will see above @ "go1.0.3 on ubuntu docker" I have almost the same error on an
ubuntu docker.

I have "fixed" it by rather downloading the built go from
https://go.googlecode.com/files/go1.0.3.linux-amd64.tar.gz, but I thought this might
still be worth reporting.  

Maybe it would be nice if there was some note on which versions of xcode or gcc to use
to be able to build certain versions of Go.
